title: Raiders-Chargers TNF Recap, Another Antonio Brown social media meltdown (Football 11/8)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough recap the Raiders 26-24 victory over the Chargers on Thursday Night Football (1:00). The guys discuss the struggles of Philip Rivers, if Los Angeles' playoff chances are done, Jon Gruden's job this season and Oakland's ability to make a run. The Pick Six Superfriends then react to another social media meltdown by Antonio Brown (27:00) and answer 5-star reviews from Apple Podcasts (33:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
